== charlestu ==

Charlestu is written with a lower case ''c''.

He can be found on Ubuntu Forums as <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/member.php?u=380316|charlestu]]</nowiki>.

He reports bugs on launchpad as <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/~charlestu|charlestu]]</nowiki>.

Charlestu is beginning to use <nowiki>[[xubuntu]]</nowiki>, and longs for an efficient, accessible, versatile, ''free'' os that can run nimbly on any old 100 mhz pentium computer with 32 mb of ram.
